elements.text: Your spouse's job has taken you all over the country with new opportunities. Your spouse's boss approaches them at work asking if they can take a position a few hours away. The thought of a new city, friends, and even medical providers is...

elements.name: Moving to a New City_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
